item.description:
Join Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this locally guided Ultimate African Safari to the Serengeti in Tanzania!

This 8 day group safari tour to The Serengeti and Ngorongoro Crater will travel February 16-23, 2013 during the world famous animal herd migration of millions of zebra, wildebeest, water buffalo and gazelles.

Considered by many to be one of life’s great adventures, an African safari through the world famous national parks of Tanzania is a trip that simply can’t be missed. On this exciting group adventure, you will join other like-minded adventure travelers and together experience plenty of opportunities for big game viewing and to take in the vast and incredible natural attractions of Tanzania, including the world-famous Serengeti National Park and the breathtaking Ngorongoro Crater.

Check out the photo gallery from the last African Safari club group tour

-----------------------------------------------------------------

GET THE SCOOP! Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Pricing and Booking:

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

PRICE ALERT: Price is normally $3,299, however the first 8 people to book will get a deeply discount price of $2,899... Book fast to get this price (see link below to book)










-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in this adventure:
* 8 day / 7 night fully guided safari with expert local guide and driver
* Visit Africa's greatest national parks: Serengeti, Ngorongoro Crater, and Lake Manyara
* Comfortable 4x4 Land Cruiser type vehicles with open viewing roof
* Optional visit to an active Masai Mara village
* Beautiful hotel in Moshi with stunning views of Mt. Kilimanjaro, an excellent restaurant, in ground pool, high speed internet connectivity, clean rooms and a garden to relax in
* All meals while on safari and breakfast in Moshi
* 6 nights excellent mid-range hotel accommodation and 2 nights in a comfortable tent camp (with in-tent shower and toilet)
* National Park gate fees

Click Here For Complete Details and Booking.

Places Visited: Safari to Serengeti, Ngorongoro Crater, Lake Manyara National Park, Tarangire National Park, Olduvai Gorge, Moshi, Arusha

-----------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 20,000+ members. Check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page to see what members are saying about these trips.

The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures.

For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World.
item.name: AFRICAN SAFARI: The Great Migration in the Serengeti - 8 Days
